abstract: The sale of the Texas Rangers baseball team ends months of wrangling between the Hicks Sports Group, headed by the former private equity maven Thomas O. Hicks, and the team’s debt holders.
snippet: The sale of the Texas Rangers baseball team ends months of wrangling between the Hicks Sports Group, headed by the former private equity maven Thomas O. Hicks, and the team’s debt holders.
lead_paragraph: The sale of the Texas Rangers baseball team ends months of wrangling between the Hicks Sports Group, headed by the former private equity maven Thomas O. Hicks, and the team’s debt holders, made up of various investors including hedge funds and wealthy individuals.

headline.main: Rangers’ Sale Ends Months of Wrangling
